In a message dated 4/13/03 12:20:50 AM Eastern Daylight Time,
starsuncloud@... writes:

> Just in case there was any question...which I doubt there was, THAT was a
> fundi.
>
>

You mean underwear for two. LOL. Only kidding.
Pam G.


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: I am unsubscribing ll
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 4/12/03 5:06:19 PM Central Daylight Time, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 4/12/03 5:06:19 PM Central Daylight Time,
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:

<< My
email box has been littered with hundreds of emails (most of no value) that
have assualted my faith and have suggested that I abandon my responsibility
to "TRAIN UP MY CHILD IN THE WAY HE SHOULD GO SO THAT WHEN HE IS OLD HE WILL
NOT DEPART FROM IT" (Bible verse) I am suggesting that all Christians run
from this loop as fast as you can and go spend the time you would have
wasted
sifting thru this garbage can loop to perhaps find a useful philosophicial
morsel and spend it eating at a buffet of wisdom in the company of the
CREATOR of the universe. >>

Just in case there was any question...which I doubt there was, THAT was a
fundi.

Ren
"The sun is shining--the sun is shining. That is the magic. The flowers are
growing--the roots are stirring. That is the magic. Being alive is the
magic--being strong is the magic The magic is in me--the magic is in
me....It's in every one of us."

----Frances Hodgson Burnett
